title: Gorgeous drop down 1 BD lower unit, Garden Style
map_address: 1005 North Stephenson Highway, Royal Oak, MI near Forest St
street_address: 1005 North Stephenson Highway, Royal Oak, MI
posting_body: Unique lower level one bedroom unit with beautifull exposed brick living area; drop down lower level living room, beautiful stainless steel kitchen appliances with granite counters, updated bathroom/tiled shower, Huge bedroom, all wood floors!
Laundry room and pool on site, open off street parking; close to Royal Oak markets and all major Highways, parks, shopping and entertainment!
Flat rate monthly additional to rent of $100 heat, water, trash and sewer.
Easy move in process, everything done online!
Pay rent, request work orders, convenient tenant portal/instant communication!
Hurry before this beauty is gone!
